name: Nhü (Giorgio Perri - The Techromancer)
description:
Nhü is a 2D pixel art platformer. This side scrolling adventure has been fun to realize and has represented a wonderful sandbox for me to play in.

You’ll play as a green forest spirit called Nhü, immersed in a monochrome world full of harmful technologies and bad creatures. 

Controls:

Arrows or "A" and "D" to Move.

Space to Jump and Double Jump.

"J" to Slash your weapon.

"K" to  Fire an energy blast..
